title: DETOX HERBAL TEA - Café Barsel
author: Name
description: Herbal tea of cinnamon, ginger, turmeric, cardamom, pepper and cloves. Herbal tea in a staple-free pyramid-shaped fabric bag, with 15 bags per box. A format which helps in brewing, as the leaves can expand as they hydrate. Caffeine level: None Brewing method: water at around 75 degrees centigrade. Use water with a moderate mineral content, and do not leave to brew for more than 3 minutes. From 1 to 3 minutes depending on the desired intensity.
